attributes.action: Make a law for fathers to use annual leave to help out in school holidays
attributes.additional_details: I have asked her father several times with no avail. It would help out greatly if both sets of parents had to do this by law and I feel it would also bring tax credits childcare costs down for people who claim.
attributes.background: Ive struggles for the passed 4 years during school holidays to find affordable childcare. I only get 4 weeks annual leave so I struggle and even have to take unpaid leave while paying a mortgage which isn’t ideal. My daughters fathers refuses to help out which I think is unfair. It should be equal.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
